name: Bloop (itch) (ruinerr)
description:
A magical musical journey for a random block guy to bloop on note blocks!

Objective:

A platformer / rhythm game where you must trigger the note blocks when you land on them.

Get as many note blocks in a row as you can without touching the ground and you will increase your score multiplier!

Controls:

KeyActionUp ArrowJumpSpaceStart / Trigger
